title: Track My Expenses
shortDescription: Full Stack MERN App for tracking and analyzing expenses.
intro: TrackMyExpenses is a web-based personal finance application designed to help users track income and expenses in a simple and efficient way. The project focuses on clean UI, ease of use, and real-time financial visibility.
problem: Managing daily expenses manually or through spreadsheets is time-consuming and often inconsistent. Many existing applications are complex or overloaded with features, making them unsuitable for quick and regular expense tracking.
solution: TrackMyExpenses offers a lightweight and intuitive solution that allows users to record transactions and instantly view their financial balance. The application simplifies expense management while ensuring fast performance and accessibility.

title: Chatbox UI
shortDescription: Frontend chat interface with real-time messaging and presence.
problem: Teams need low-latency chat with presence and reliable delivery.
solution: Socket.IO with Redis pub/sub for presence; optimistic UI updates and replay on reconnect.
